ygData.subject: RE: Jewelry - what are you wearing?
ygData.msgSnippet: i have the exact same items except rings.  i went with platinum fire emerald rings for 5str/5dex each.  my current stats are: STR 150 STA 80 AGI 119 DEX 147
ygData.messageBody:
i have the exact same items except rings. i went with platinum fire emerald
rings for 5str/5dex each. my current stats are:

STR 150
STA >80
AGI 119
DEX 147
WIS ?
INT ?
CHA 103

i could get my charisma up and not lose any dex with those different rings,
but harmonic knows i'm really a tank at heart =)

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L31 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server


>
> My current stats in mostly Lambent are:
>
> STR 106
> STA 75
> AGI 104
> DEX 138
> WIS 60
> INT 79
> CHA 121
>
> Crier Sharpsong - 34th song bard on Fennin Ro
>
>
> Here's the text from Harmonic's old message 8/10/99:
>
> --- --- ---
> I have looked over all the jewellery that an enchanter can make.
> I also realize there are earrings, rings, etc available to higher
> level players from dungeons. This is my take on the best player
> made jewellery in the game for a bard, and what I currently wear.
>
> face: platinum star ruby veil, cha9 dex9
> neck: golden black pearl choker, agi7 dex7
> ear: electrum sapphire earring, str4, int2
> ear: electrum sapphire earring, str4, int2
> finger: golden star ruby ring, dex7, cha5
> finger: golden star ruby ring, dex7, cha5
